title: Favorite Rioter quotes
body:
"We aren't nerfing Lee Sin because Lee Sin mains would be mad" -Morello
"Don't call us fucking greedy!" -Riot owner man
"Eat shit melees, ranged/Mage life is superior" -GhostCrawler
"I have a phD, but more importantly, I have a bad ass tat with your sisters name on my ass" -Lyte
"Haha fucking banned and owned kid" -Keyru
"I have 3 nipples" -Phreak
"Argh ugh guh hmrph hng *click click*" Jatt on c9 making 2015 worlds 
"Can I draw you with slightly less clothes on?" -IronStylus
